meta.content: Palmyra Schools - Free/Reduced Lunch Form: Changes in Circumstances Due to COVID-19

As we continue to battle COVID-19, we understand the financial effect it has taken on Nebraska's economy and Nebraska's families. If your financial circumstances have changed due to COVID-19, please take a few moments to print and fill out the following CONFIDENTIAL document for Free/Reduced meals for District OR1 students. Please consider snapping a picture of each side of the completed document and e-mailing the pictures...

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:54 am CDT

div.div: A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly after 4pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 77. South southwest wind 8 to 13 mph. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. South wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north northwest after midnight. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the afternoon.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.h3: Free/Reduced Lunch Form: Changes in Circumstances Due to COVID-19
div.p: As we continue to battle COVID-19, we understand the financial effect it has taken on Nebraska's economy and Nebraska's families. If your financial circumstances have changed due to COVID-19, please take a few moments to print and fill out the following CONFIDENTIAL document for Free/Reduced meals for District OR1 students. Please consider snapping a picture of each side of the completed document and e-mailing the pictures to phillips.lis@districtor1.net
NOTE: this will not affect your status regarding our current food program.

p.a: Click HERE to Download the Free/Reduced Food Program Form
